ComicInfo.Title: Homelands Chapter Five: Pax Imperium
ComicInfo.Summary: Homelands Chapter Five: Pax Imperium: Geppetto finishes the history of the Adversary as Pinocchio is brought up to speed on whatâ€™s been happening. Blue then meets Red, and the two of them escape via the witching cloak back to Fabletown.
